text: Avadan () is a rural locality (a selo) in Dokuzparinsky District, Dagestan, Russia. The population was 2894 as of 2018.Численность населения Российской Федерации по муниципальным образованиям на 1 января 2018 года There are 44 streets.Улицы села Авадан == Geography == The village is located 15 km south from Derbent, on the Rubas River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Dagestan
title: Avadan, Dagestan
